short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Work productively with in-tab overlays. Copy paste, monitor or watch anything in a single tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The overlay will remain open as long as it's focused - Copypaste, monitor or watch anything, streamlining your work all in the single tab!
